title: Gross domestic product of the Arab world in 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
Country Saudi Arabia has the highest GDP in billion U.S. dollars and Comoros has the lowest GDP in billion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 785.34 between the maximum Country Saudi Arabia and minimum Country Comoros.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars 786.52 is found at Country Saudi Arabia and the minimum is found at Comoros where Country is 1.18.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Country Saudi Arabia and lowest at Country Comoros.
There is a difference of 785.34 between the maximum Country Saudi Arabia and minimum Country Comoros.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars at Country Saudi Arabia is 786.52 , second place is United Arab Emirates  at 414.18, and thirdly is Egypt at 249.56.
The average GDP in billion U.S. dollars in all 20 Countrys is 133.61.
